name: Fruits of the Forest
description:
Fruits of the Forest (FF) is a 2D co-operative side-scrolling game, the players are a pair of Capybaras going after their stolen prize pear which was snatched by the Pear King - the ruler of the evil forest of fruits. They are required to battle vicious fruits and pass through the forest terrain to defeat the Pear King himself using their signature weapon - a blender also known as The Dolores ™ and their ability to attack and defend, working together to keep each other safe on such a journey. 

Game MUST have controller input to play. 

-----

Made by the Moomins, a group of five students studying Game Design at Media Design School in Auckland, NZ: 

Hans Culton, our illustrious leader and prime Moomin,

Thomas Sheppard, our amazing programmer who we almost overworked to exhaustion,  

Callum de Vere, our lead artist and resident dendrophile, 

Michael Jeon, our amateur graphic designer/artiste with growing dark circles,

and Jacob Morbeck, whose Dragonfruit sets a new standard.

Contact us at

All respect to Tove Jansson and the Jansson family, please don't sue us we're a bunch of poor students.
